text: Ismail bin Kijo (28 May 1952 â€“ 3 February 2021) was a Malaysian politician. He was Member of the Selangor State Assembly for Lembah Jaya of three terms from 1995 to 2008. On 3 February 2021, Ismail died from COVID-19 during the pandemic in Malaysia. He was 68. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Malaysian politicians Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Malaysia Category:People from Selangor
title: Ismail Kijo
